text: Nalikane wong Yahudi padha didhawuhi, "Sira padha percaya ngestokna al-Qur'an kang wis didhawuhake dening Allah", wangsulane, "Kita sami pitados ngestokaken kitab Taurat ingkang sampun dipun dhawuhaken dhumateng kita." Wong Yahudi mau padha maido kitab kang didhawuhake sawise taurat, kang mangka kitab kang didhawuhake sawise taurat iku kang bener, cocok kato wecane taurat, cecekelane si Yahudi. (Muhammad) sira dhawuha, "Yen temen sira padha percaya, ngestokake kitab padha nyedani para Nabining Allah
